mapper.select: SELECT CTG_ID, CTG_TITLE, CTG_HIERACHY, CTG_SORT, CTG_PRT_ID FROM TB_ARTICLE_CTG WHERE CTG_ACTIVATED = 0 START WITH CTG_PRT_ID is null CONNECT BY PRIOR CTG_ID = CTG_PRT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS by CTG_SORT

SELECT CTG_ID, CTG_TITLE, CTG_HIERACHY, CTG_SORT, CTG_PRT_ID FROM TB_ARTICLE_CTG WHERE CTG_ACTIVATED = 0 AND CTG_ID NOT IN (SELECT DISTINCT CTG_PRT_ID FROM TB_ARTICLE_CTG WHERE CTG_PRT_ID IS NOT NULL) START WITH CTG_PRT_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR CTG_ID = CTG_PRT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY CTG_SORT

SELECT CTG_ID, CTG_TITLE, CTG_HIERACHY, CTG_SORT, CTG_PRT_ID, (SELECT CTG_TITLE FROM TB_ARTICLE_CTG X WHERE A.CTG_PRT_ID = X.CTG_ID) AS CTG_PRT_TITLE --,substr(sys_connect_by_path ( CTG_TITLE, ' > '),4) chart FROM TB_ARTICLE_CTG A WHERE CTG_ACTIVATED = 0 START WITH CTG_PRT_ID is null CONNECT BY PRIOR CTG_ID = CTG_PRT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS by CTG_SORT
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_ARTICLE_CTG (CTG_ID, CTG_TITLE, CTG_HIERACHY, CTG_REG_DATE, CTG_UPT_DATE, CTG_SORT, CTG_PRT_ID, CTG_ACTIVATED) VALUES (#{ctgId}, #{ctgTitle}, #{ctgHierachy}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{ctgSort}, #{ctgPrtId}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE TB_ARTICLE_CTG SET CTG_TITLE=#{ctgTitle}, CTG_SORT=#{ctgSort}, CTG_REG_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE CTG_ID = #{ctgId}
